entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind becoming north 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 32 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Temperature rising to minus 7 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of snow beginning near midnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h late in the evening. Temperature rising to minus 7 by morning. Wind chill minus 24 in the evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023
